article_title: Steps to College conference helps DREAMERS in education path
article_text: Hordes of families filed in and out of the Mexican Consulate in North Natomas on Saturday, waiting patiently to fill out applications for financial aid – an option only recently made available to undocumented students determined to attend college regardless of legal status.

article_metadata.title: Steps to College conference helps DREAMERS in education path | The Sacramento Bee
